timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.description: Set your trading timezone for accurate session times

clockNumbers.label: Show Numbers
clockNumbers.description: Display numbers on the clock face

eventsOnCanvas.label: Events on canvas
eventsOnCanvas.description: Display economic event markers on the analog face

sessionNames.label: Session names
sessionNames.description: Display session names curved along the session donuts

timeToEnd.label: Time to end
timeToEnd.description: Show time remaining in current session

sessionBased.label: Session-based Background
sessionBased.description: Automatically shift background color to match the active session

sessions.title: Session schedule
sessions.subtitle: Edit your trading sessions. Auth is required to sync changes.

drawer.title: Settings
drawer.subtitle: Create your account to unlock all features
drawer.unlockButton: Create your account to unlock all settings

admin.confirmSyncNFS: Sync this week from NFS now? This may take a few seconds.
admin.confirmSyncActuals: Sync today's actuals from JBlanked (all sources)? This may take a few seconds.
admin.confirmSyncForexFactory: Backfill Forex Factory events since 01/01/26? This may take several minutes.
admin.errorSyncForexFactory: Failed to backfill Forex Factory events.

modals.clearSessionInfo: Clear session {{number}}? This will reset session name, start, and end times.
modals.resetSettingsInfo: This will reset all settings including sessions, colors, and preferences to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
modals.logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to log out? You'll need to sign in again to access your saved settings.

errors.minimumToggle: At least one of the main clock elements must be enabled.
